channel.title: Interface Placement [PI]
channel.description:
We are trying to add a interface to the equipment tab, but we are having trouble... [U]This is what it currently looks like:[/U] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mhxffm.png[/img]
[U]We want it to look like this, but without the experience lock interface...[/U] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5aosva.jpg[/img]
When we add the interfaces to the cache, this is what it comes out to look like... [IMG]http://puu.sh/3a6PX.jpg[/img]
How can we fix this?

item.title: Interface Placement [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is client sided and not hard at all.
Add the new interface and remove the middle button.

Read full topic
